titleStmt.title: Tythe no gospel maintenance for gospel ministers In an epistle to all who conscienciously suffer for not paying them. By William Loddington.
titleStmt.author: Loddington, William, 1626?-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; cropped and stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' Library, London.

place.placeName: the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-street
